name: Seroutte (itch)
description:
Seroutte is a short horror game based on a nightmare I had once, involving staying quiet but being unable to control my voice. All you have to do is get a drink and go back to bed.

Regarding the donation, I'd much rather you take the game for free and then come back to donate if you feel you want to. Don't feel you have to, I'm not relying on the money to live or anything. It'd just be cool to actually make some money from something I made.
